attributes.action: Allow Security Officers to be more protected.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government should take notice that knife crime and assaults are on the rise. The Police community support officers and soldiers all receive better training to protect themselves and they are issued with stab vests and cs spray. With the proper training All security officers should have the same protection. Private shops and businesses are starting to employ more and more security services to protect their livlihoods and fellow workers. Criminals don't careless who they hurt to get what they want and we security officers have a right to defend ourselves and not tolorate weapons being used on us We have a right to protect ourselves if we need to.
